titles.title: To resolve title issues involving real property and equipment acquired using funds provided under the Alaska Kiln Drying Grant Program.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Agriculture.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Department Operations, Oversight, and Credit.

bill.summary: 1/17/2012--Introduced. Vests title to real property and equipment acquired using funds provided by a grant under the Alaska Kiln Drying Grant Program in the grant recipient in accordance with the compensation provisions in this Act.
